Parameters:

Returns:
the collection of subclasses, if any

Get the parent GrailsDomainClass for the given GrailsDomainClass, if it exists in the given collection otherwise null

Parameters:
grailsDomainClass - the class whose parent to find
grailsDomainClasses - the collection of possible parents
Returns:
null if the given class has no parent or the parent is not in the collection

getClazzes

public static Collection getClazzes(Collection grailsDomainClasses)
Get the actual (user-defined) Classes for the given GrailsDomainClass Collection. Equivalent to collecting the results of grailsDomainClass.getClazz() on each element

Parameters:
grailsDomainClasses -
Returns:
A collection of User-defined classes, which may be empty

isWithinInhertitanceHierarchy

public static boolean isWithinInhertitanceHierarchy(org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsDomainClass grailsDomainClass,
                                                    Collection grailsDomainClasses)
Is the given GrailsDomainClass with an inheritance hierarchy with the given collection?

Parameters:
grailsDomainClass - the grails domain class
grailsDomainClasses - the collection of grails domain classes
Returns:
true if the given class is within a hierarchy: it has super or sub-classes
